title: 208 - Watch And Services Not Enough To Save Apple (Victor Dergunov)
description: Apple stock has lost around 1/4 of it's value, how concerned should investors be? According to Victor, Apple is still a great company but the days of amazing growth are over and Watch and Services are not enough to fill the gap.
